text: Gei goodou la go di madawaawa ne hilihili, digau hai mee dabu ni di king, nia daangada dabuaahia, nia dama donu a God ne hilihili aga belee hagadele nia mee haga goboina ala ne hai gi ono lima, dela ne gahigahi mai goodou gi daha mo di bouli, gaa dugu goodou gi lodo dono maalama madamada.2.9 Exodus 19.5-6; Isaiah 43.20,21; Deuteronomy 4.20; 7.6; 14.2; Titus 2.14; Isaiah 9.2
